scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check:frontend && npm run type-check:backend
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:frontend && npm run install:backend
scripts.update:all: npm update && npm audit fix && npm run update:frontend && npm run update:backend
scripts.update:frontend: cd frontend && npm update && npm audit fix
scripts.update:backend: cd backend && npm update && npm audit fix
scripts.audit: npm audit && npm run audit:frontend && npm run audit:backend
scripts.audit:fix: npm audit fix --force && npm run audit:fix:frontend && npm run audit:fix:backend
scripts.clean: rm -rf frontend/dist backend/dist frontend/node_modules backend/node_modules node_modules
